description: Developed and deployed multiple web applications using React, enhancing application stability, interactivity, and user experience. Ensured high-quality, maintainable code across all development stages by implementing rigorous code reviews and comprehensive testing procedures, significantly reducing bug rates post-launch. Streamlined development and deployment processes by managing containers with Docker Compose, creating consistent and isolated environments for efficient replication and setup. Collaborated with clients and the UI/UX design team to optimize product design, resulting in improved user satisfaction and seamless implementation of design solutions.

Development and deployment of multiple features using ReactJS, NodeJS, and MongoDB, improving application performance and user engagement while adhering Agile Scrum methodologies. Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to streamline backend processes, improve system responsiveness, and ensure reliable integration for new functionalities. Configured and managed AWS services, including EC2, S3, CloudWatch, and Elastic Load Balancers, ensuring high availability, efficient resource utilization, and improved infrastructure scalability. Implemented Redis as a caching solution to address high application latency, significantly enhancing performance; Optimized MongoDB queries by applying indexes, further reducing response times. Improved code quality and team efficiency through comprehensive refactoring using SOLID principles, clean code practices, and consistent code reviews.

Modernized and maintained dynamic webpages using PHP, WordPress, and MySQL, improving site performance and user experience while optimizing page load times.Enhanced application response times and backend efficiency by managing web development projects focused on middleware and API connectivity, streamlining data exchange processes and improving system performance. Improved code quality and system reliability by implementing robust backend functionalities, maintaining data storage solutions, and ensuring proper documentation of the codebase.

Upgraded user engagement by developing mobile applications with React Native/Typescript, creating intuitive interfaces and efficient APIs, which significantly improved the user experience. Ensured seamless data synchronization and secure management by engineering backend services with NodeJS and Prisma, and optimizing PostgreSQL databases, resulting in robust and secure app functionality.
